SELECT f.*, c.categoryname FROM flowers f LEFT JOIN category c ON f.categoryid = c.id
and f.categoryid = #{categoryId}
and (f.state = 1 || f.state =3)
ORDER BY f.creatime DESC
SELECT f.*, c.categoryname FROM flowers f LEFT JOIN category c ON f.categoryid = c.id WHERE f.state = 1 and f.id = #{id}

SELECT d.* FROM detail d WHERE d.title LIKE concat( '%', #{content}, '%' ) OR d.gopath LIKE concat( '%', #{content}, '%' ) OR d.feature LIKE concat( '%', #{content}, '%' ) OR d.introduction LIKE concat( '%', #{content}, '%')
SELECT t.n name, count( d.id ) value FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT id c, categoryname n FROM category ) t LEFT JOIN phones d ON t.c = d.categoryid GROUP BY t.n
